SQL.GET_NEW_TABS: SELECT CODE,ENGLISH,TAB_ICON_IMG FROM ELP_NEW_APPLICATION_TAB ORDER BY CODE,ENGLISH
SQL.GET_NEW_FORMS: SELECT f.NEW_APPLICATION_FORM_ID,f.TAB, f.CODE,f.ENGLISH,f.RELATIVE_URL,f.NAV_ALWAYS_ALLOWED, f.FORM_CATEGORY_CODE, tt.Translation Tab_Desc , tr.Translation FormCat_Desc, f.Query_String FROM ELP_NEW_APPLICATION_FORM f inner join elp_tab t on f.tab = t.code inner join ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION tt on tt.DICT_ITEM_ID = t.DICT_ITEM_ID and tt.language_id = :language_id left outer join elp_form_category fc on f.FORM_CATEGORY_CODE = fc.CODE left outer join ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION tr on tr.DICT_ITEM_ID = fc.DICT_ITEM_ID and tr.language_id = tt.language_id ORDER BY TAB,CODE,ENGLISH
